scripts.setup: nodemcu-tool upload initialize-wifi.lua && nodemcu-tool run initialize-wifi.lc && nodemcu-tool remove initialize-wifi.lc
scripts.start: nodemcu-tool upload ./app/init.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/wifi.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/libraries.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/redux.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/garlandLightsReducer.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/garlandLightsMiddleware.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/store.lua && nodemcu-tool upload ./app/webserver.lua
